TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed PlatformID extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Identifies the operating system, or platform, supported by an assembly.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Environment.OSVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.OperatingSystem.Platform%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to obtain the PlatformID enumeration for the currently executing operating system or development platform. Use the PlatformID enumeration to help determine whether the current operating system or development platform supports your application.
You can use the underlying integer value of each PlatformID enumeration member, as shown in the table, as the `PlatformId` argument for the [SignTool.exe (Sign Tool)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) utility.
|Member|Underlying value| |------------|----------------------| |Win32S|0| |Win32Windows|1| |Win32NT|2| |WinCE|3| |Unix|4| |Xbox|5| |MacOSX|6|
## Examples The following example demonstrates using the PlatformID class to identify the currently executing operating system.
[!code-vb[PlatformID.class#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.platformid_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[PlatformID.class#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.platformid_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[PlatformID.class#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.platformid_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.PlatformID MacOSX = int32(6)
.field public static literal valuetype System.PlatformID Unix = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.PlatformID Win32NT = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The operating system is Windows NT or later.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.PlatformID Win32S = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The operating system is Win32s. Win32s is a layer that runs on 16-bit versions of Windows to provide access to 32-bit applications.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.PlatformID Win32Windows = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The operating system is Windows 95 or Windows 98.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.PlatformID WinCE = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The operating system is Windows CE.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.PlatformID Xbox = int32(5)
